Uses of Interface
android.view.inputmethod.InputMethod

Packages that use InputMethod
android.inputmethodservice Base classes for writing input methods. 
android.view.inputmethod Framework classes for interaction between views and input methods (such as soft keyboards). 
 

Uses of InputMethod in android.inputmethodservice
 

Classes in android.inputmethodservice that implement InputMethod
 class AbstractInputMethodService.AbstractInputMethodImpl
          Base class for derived classes to implement their InputMethod interface.
 class InputMethodService.InputMethodImpl
          Concrete implementation of AbstractInputMethodService.AbstractInputMethodImpl that provides all of the standard behavior for an input method.

Uses of InputMethod in android.view.inputmethod
 

Classes in android.view.inputmethod that implement InputMethod
 class DefaultInputMethod
          This is the default input method that runs in the same context of the application that requests text input.
